ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Sourced_Payout_Model__c)), Sourced_Payout_Model__c != 'Percentage', Sourced_Payout_Model__c != 'Flat Rate' ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Influence_Payout_Model__c)), Influence_Payout_Model__c != 'Percentage', Influence_Payout_Model__c != 'Flat Rate' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter either "Percentage" or "Flat Rate" value as Influence Payout Model and Sourced Payout Model
